fields.name: AppId
fields.description: Set to the app Id of the client JWT making the request.

fields.name: ObjectId
fields.description: Set to the object Id of the client JWT making the request. Not all users have object Id. For CSP (reseller) scenarios for example, object Id is not available.

fields.name: PrincipalId
fields.description: Set to the principal Id of the client JWT making the request. Service principal will not have the principal Id.

fields.name: PrincipalName
fields.description: Set to the principal name / UPN of the client JWT making the request.

fields.name: TenantId
fields.description: Set to the tenant ID of the client JWT making the request.
